originalText.text: As a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints. I love visiting the temple anytime I’m in a new place. It was awesome that our Sunday sacrament service was in the Temple!the ward I attended at 9 AM had a great young couple speaking. Such a beautiful building. I’m Geri was able to attend before it undergoes renovations.

text.text: As a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints. I love visiting the temple anytime I’m in a new place. It was awesome that our Sunday sacrament service was in the Temple!the ward I attended at 9 AM had a great young couple speaking. Such a beautiful building. I’m Geri was able to attend before it undergoes renovations.

originalText.text: The Manhattan Temple is beautiful!  It was on the smaller side since I’m used to all the big temples in Utah but It was equally beautiful and the temple security and workers were so kind and loving!  We met temple workers which were a set of Senior missionaries from Boise Idaho that helped us and were so nice!!! Along with Brother and Sister Weist which were also temple workers and had the sweetest and most inviting spirit!!!wr came here with our daughter for service work and enjoyed the beautiful building and spirit of the Savior.  After we went upstairs because we heard there were beautiful paintings and I didn’t realize that the church chapel was upstairs.  Never seen that’s before above a temple but it looked just like the chapel buildings back at home in Utah.  It has a great layout and Everything they needed.  Inside this building was also a family history area.  I was so surprised to see how much they were able to build at that location.  The Temple is built in a beautiful location close to Central Park and like always the temple grounds are well kept.  Wish I could have attended the Sunday services but was so glad to have attended the temple with my family.  Loves this place and will visit again if return to NYC!

originalText.text: One of the most beautiful and iconic LDS Temples ever. I love how this building is a beacon of light in the midst of the big city. ✨️ The chapel and grounds are stunning.

text.text: One of the most beautiful and iconic LDS Temples ever. I love how this building is a beacon of light in the midst of the big city. ✨️ The chapel and grounds are stunning.

originalText.text: I have been here a few times in my life to visit for both attending church and visiting the temple grounds. Beautiful religious building in New York. Reminds me to focus on the Savior Jesus Christ to help us find greater kindness and peace in this world.

text.text: I have been here a few times in my life to visit for both attending church and visiting the temple grounds. Beautiful religious building in New York. Reminds me to focus on the Savior Jesus Christ to help us find greater kindness and peace in this world.

originalText.text: We were too late to go inside, and not quite dressed for the ocassion, but we wanted to find it and see what it looked like! It was right in Manhattan which is a very busy place with tons of traffic! It would be fun and a great experience to be able to to inside someday!
